title: where do I go to suggest idea's for and complain about the new client

replies.body: Our client devs are accepting ideas and feedback through our [client discussion](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) boards!  If you find any bugs, though, be sure to submit them using the little bug icon on the lower right-hand side of the client.  Thanks for your help!
